description.title: Fire Hazards
description.description: Find and collect possible fire hazards to prevent a forest fire!

tutorial.click: Click on any spot in the scene to get a list of placeable objects.
tutorial.place: Choose one of those objects to place it.
tutorial.move: Move the object by drag and drop
tutorial.rotate: Rotate, scale and delete the selected object by using the toolbar button
tutorial.info: This scene is not as harmless as it might seem!
tutorial.hazards: Scattered throughout these scene are dangerous hazards.
tutorial.collect: Collect them by clicking on them and prevent a massive disaster before it is too late!
tutorial.magnifier: Use the magnifying glass to look behind the objects.
